steps: Add 1 tbsp oil to a large pan/wok on medium/high heat. Once hot, add ginger and garlic. Let cook for a minute, then add the onion. Add the rest of the vegetables, and stir frequently. Stir fry for 2-3 minutes and store for later.
In a bowl, mix together the sauce.
Cook the noodles as instructed. Do not over cook, as it will be cooked again with the sauce. Once the noodles are done, rince with cold water to wash off the starch.

Add the second tbsp of oil to the pan/wok on medium/high heat. Add the noodles and stir fry for 2 minutes. Add the sauce and stir fry for another 2 minutes. Finally, add the vegetables and cook for another 2 minutes.
